summary: Examines the new media monopoly by corporations in America versus the public battle for truth and democracy.
cast: Julian Assange|Robert Baer|Joe Biden|Kristina Borjesson|Dick Cheney|Ahmed Chlabi|Bill Clinton|Jeff Cohen|Daniel Ellsberg|Newt Gingrich|Amy Goodman|Al Gore|Dick Gregory|Sean Hannity|Chris Hedges|Saddam Hussein|Janine Jackson|John MacArthur|Kevin Martin|Robert McChesney|James Murdoch|Rupert Murdoch|John Nichols|Barack Obama|Colin Powell|Michael Powell|Dan Rather|Charlie Rose|Donald Rumsfeld|David Simon|Norman Solomon|George Tenet|Gary Webb
title: Shadows of Liberty
